item.title: 欧盟调查Shein销售非法产品及成瘾性设计
item.description: 欧盟周二对中资电商平台Shein启动正式调查，涉及非法商品销售及平台设计可能引发成瘾的担忧，此举标志着欧盟在严格的《数字服务法》框架下加强监管力度。【原文：The EU opened a formal investigation into Chinese online retailer Shein on Tuesday over illegal products and concerns about the platform's potentially addictive design, stepping up scrutiny under the bloc's strict Digital Services Act.】

item.title: 沃什或许希望缩减美联储资产负债表规模，但这很难实现。
item.description: 被提名为美联储主席的凯文·沃什或许希望缩减央行资产负债表规模，但若不大幅调整金融体系，这一目标恐难实现；即便如此，也未必能如愿以偿。【原文：Kevin Warsh, nominated to lead the Federal Reserve, may want a smaller central bank balance sheet, but he’s unlikely to get it absent major tinkering with the financial system, and even then, it might not be possible.】

item.title: 高盛、纳斯达克首席执行官将出席小唐纳德·特朗普与埃里克·特朗普在海湖庄园主办的加密货币"论坛"
item.description: 本周三，华尔街知名高管与投资者将齐聚佛罗里达州棕榈滩的特朗普私人俱乐部海湖庄园，与联邦官员及美国国会议员共同探讨"金融与科技的未来"。【原文：On Wednesday, prominent Wall Street executives and investors will convene to discuss the “future of finance and technology” alongside federal officials and U.S. lawmakers at President Donald Trump’s private Mar-a-Lago club in Palm Beach, Florida.】

item.title: 美元在连续四个月下跌后或将迎来喘息之机
item.description: 在历经四个月的下跌后，美元即将迎来短暂喘息。随着政治经济环境转向利好，部分市场分析师对美元转为看涨。【原文：The U.S. dollar is due for a bit of reprieve after its four-month decline as the political and economic backdrop turns in its favor and some market analysts turn bullish on the currency.】

item.title: 尼日利亚就Temu涉嫌违反数据保护规定展开调查
item.description: 尼日利亚数据监管机构周二宣布，已对中资电商巨头Temu涉嫌违反数据法规展开调查。此举可能导致这家企业面临非洲最大市场之一的法律处罚。【原文：Nigeria's data watchdog has opened a probe into Chinese-owned e-commerce giant Temu for suspected data-law violations, the regulator said on Tuesday, a move that could usher in legal penalties in one of Africa's biggest markets.】

item.title: 从米兰诺的无人机到洛杉矶28号的星尘与人工智能，奥运转播商勾勒好莱坞愿景
item.description: 米兰奥运会凭借创新运用第一人称视角无人机以惊人速度追拍运动员赛道风采令观众叹为观止，而2028年洛杉矶夏季奥运会将带来更沉浸式的体验——奥运转播服务公司负责人扬尼斯·埃克萨霍斯周二表示，届时将广泛运用人工智能技术，并汇聚众多全球明星助阵。【原文：If the Milano Games have left viewers impressed with the innovative use of First-Person View drones chasing athletes down the course at dizzying speeds, the Los Angeles 2028 Summer Olympics will be the most immersive experience, with extensive use of AI and a generous sprinkling of global stars, Olympic Broadcasting Services head Yiannis Exarchos said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉紧张局势有望缓解，圭亚那石油增长潜力上升
item.description: 地缘政治与石油专家在圭亚那能源会议前表示，这个微型产油国圭亚那作为全球增长最快的经济体之一，正迎来进一步扩张的机遇窗口——当前美国在邻国委内瑞拉持续开展活动，为圭亚那创造了发展契机。【原文：The tiny oil-producing nation of Guyana, already one of the world's fastest-growing economies, has a window of opportunity for more expansion amid ongoing U.S. activity in neighboring Venezuela, geopolitical and oil experts said ahead of the Guyana Energy Conference.】

item.title: 礼来公司高管称，随着Mounjaro销售额激增，该公司正将印度作为全球出口枢纽
item.description: 礼来公司高管表示，这家美国制药巨头计划将印度打造为其全球供应链枢纽，此举是该公司此前承诺的10亿美元印度合同制造投资计划的一部分。【原文：Mounjaro-maker Eli Lilly wants to turn India into a hub for its global supply chain, a senior executive at the U.S. drugmaker said, as part of its previously committed $1 billion investment to contract manufacturing in the country.】

item.title: 英国SatVu公司获4100万美元融资，北约基金参与投资
item.description: 英国卫星公司SatVu周二宣布，已完成3000万英镑（约合4080万美元）的新一轮融资，其中包括北约创新基金（NIF）的投资。该公司利用卫星技术从太空提供高分辨率热成像图像。【原文：British company SatVu, which uses satellites to provide high-resolution thermal imagery from space, has raised 30 million pounds ($40.8 million) in new funding, including backing from the NATO Innovation Fund (NIF), it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 全球投资者保持"超级乐观"态度，但警告企业投资过度
item.description: 美国银行周二公布的月度基金经理调查显示，全球投资者日益担忧企业过度投资，而此时市场情绪仍处于"超级看涨"状态，资产进一步增值似乎更难实现。【原文：Global investors are increasingly worried that companies are overinvesting, just as market sentiment remains “uber‑bullish” and further asset gains look harder to achieve, Bank of America’s monthly fund manager survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 西班牙将调查X、Meta和TikTok平台上的人工智能生成儿童性虐待材料
item.description: "这些平台正在损害我们孩子的心理健康、尊严和权利，"总理佩德罗·桑切斯表示。【原文："These platforms are undermining the mental health, dignity, and rights of our children," Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez said.】

item.title: 印度阿达尼集团计划到2035年投资1000亿美元建设人工智能就绪型数据中心
item.description: 阿达尼企业正致力于打造全球最大的综合数据中心平台，并使印度在全球人工智能竞赛中占据领先地位。【原文：Adani Enterprises is seeking to create the world's largest integrated data centre platform and establish India as a leader in the global AI race.】

item.title: 印度印孚瑟斯公司首席执行官表示，人工智能服务贡献了该公司第三季度5.5%的营收。
item.description: 印度第二大IT服务出口商印孚瑟斯（Infosys）首席执行官萨利尔·帕雷克周二在公司活动中表示，该公司去年12月季度5.5%的营收来自人工智能服务。【原文：India's second-largest IT services exporter Infosys earned 5.5% of its revenue in the December quarter from AI services, its chief executive Salil Parekh said at a company event on Tuesday.】

item.title: 全球私募股权公司对印度板球联赛IPL趋之若鹜
item.description: 全球私募股权投资者如KKR和黑石集团在印度有了新的投资热点：板球。【原文：Global private equity investors like KKR and Blackstone have a new investment hotspot in India: cricket.】

item.title: 市场平静，外交喧嚣：万众瞩目伊朗
item.description: 罗基·斯威夫特带您展望欧洲及全球市场今日走势【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rocky Swift】

item.title: 奢侈品股波动凸显人工智能焦虑与对冲基金布局
item.description: 随着LVMH和开云集团等奢侈品公司努力从长达两年的低迷中复苏，它们正面临着由对冲基金押注和投资者对人工智能冲击市场的担忧所引发的股价剧烈波动。【原文：As luxury companies like LVMH and Gucci-owner Kering struggle to recover from a two-year slowdown, they are navigating increasingly sharp share price swings stoked by hedge fund bets and investor nerves over AI-rattled markets.】

item.title: 《金融时报》报道称，丹纳赫公司即将以近100亿美元收购马西莫公司
item.description: 《金融时报》周一援引消息人士报道称，生命科学公司丹纳赫即将以近100亿美元的价格收购脉搏血氧仪制造商美思明。【原文：Life sciences firm Danaher is closing in on a nearly $10 billion deal to acquire pulse oximeter maker Masimo , the Financial Times reported on Monday, citing sources.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，激进投资者埃利奥特已持有挪威邮轮公司逾10%股权
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士报道，激进投资者埃利奥特已持有挪威邮轮公司逾10%的股份，并计划推动这家邮轮运营商进行内部变革。【原文：Activist investor Elliott has built a more than 10% stake in Norwegian Cruise Line and plans to push for changes within the cruise operator, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚法院因虚假宣传判处埃克森美孚旗下本地汽油品牌1130万澳元罚款
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦法院因美孚石油澳大利亚公司对昆士兰州部分加油站销售的燃油作出误导性宣传，对其处以1600万澳元（约合1130万美元）罚款，该国竞争监管机构周二宣布。【原文：Federal Court of Australia has fined Mobil Oil Australia A$16 million ($11.3 million) over misleading claims about fuel sold at petrol stations in parts of Queensland, the country's competition regulator said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 高盛计划从董事会候选人标准中剔除多元化因素，《华尔街日报》报道
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士报道，高盛正计划将其董事会评估潜在候选人的标准中移除种族、性别认同、性取向及其他多元化因素。【原文：Goldman Sachs is preparing to remove race, gender identity, sexual orientation, and other diversity factors from the criteria its board uses to evaluate potential candidates, The Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 油价持稳，交易员权衡供应风险，美伊关键会谈临近
item.description: 周二油价持稳，因投资者评估伊朗在霍尔木兹海峡附近举行海军演习后可能引发的供应中断风险——该演习恰逢伊朗当天晚些时候与美国举行核谈判前夕。【原文：Oil prices were steady on Tuesday as investors assessed risks of supply disruption after Iran conducted naval drills near the Strait of Hormuz right ahead of nuclear talks with the U.S. later in the day.】

item.title: 美元在交投清淡中维持涨势，市场静候美联储会议纪要及美国GDP数据
item.description: 周二美元延续涨势，因市场正等待本周晚些时候可能出现的信号，以判断美联储降息的潜在时机。【原文：The dollar held gains on Tuesday as markets awaited signals, expected later this week, about the potential timing of rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 亚洲市场谨慎开盘，油价因美伊谈判而上涨
item.description: 日本经济持续疲软的态势周二仍备受关注，此前一天公布的国内生产总值数据远低于预期。【原文：Japan's weakening economy remained in focus on Tuesday, one day after much softer than expected GDP numbers.】

item.title: 《华尔街日报》报道称，Starboard将推动对Tripadvisor董事会进行重组
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士报道，激进投资者Starboard Value计划推动对Tripadvisor董事会进行重组。【原文：Activist investor Starboard Value plans to push for a shake-up of Tripadvisor's board, The Wall Street Journal reported on Monday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行认为未来利率没有既定路径，此前2月加息
item.description: 悉尼2月17日（路透社）——澳大利亚央行表示，若未如本月般加息，通胀率将持续居高不下，且目前尚不确定是否需要进一步收紧货币政策。【原文：SYDNEY, Feb 17 (Reuters) - Australia's central bank concluded inflation would stay stubbornly high if it had not hiked interest rates as it did this month, and was not yet sure if further tightening would be necessary.】

item.title: 爱尔兰就马斯克旗下Grok AI涉及性化图像展开调查
item.description: 上月，Grok平台应用户要求，向X平台大量推送经人工智能修改的真人近裸体图像，引发全球范围的强烈谴责及多国调查。【原文：Grok flooded X last month with AI-altered, near-nude images of real people in response to user requests, triggering widespread global outrage and investigations.】

item.title: 凯悦集团执行董事长普利兹克辞职，称其与爱泼斯坦的关联是"判断失误"
item.description: 托马斯·普利兹克表示，现年75岁的他将不会在2026年寻求连任公司董事会席位。【原文：Thomas Pritzker, 75, will not seek re-election to the company's board in 2026, he said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚天然气生产商桑托斯公司赢得关于净零排放主张的法庭诉讼
item.description: 天然气生产商桑托斯公司在一场关于其可持续发展主张的法律诉讼中胜诉。澳大利亚法院周二驳回了指控该公司就实现净零排放计划误导公众的诉讼。【原文：Gas producer Santos has won a legal battle over its sustainability claims, with an Australian court on Tuesday dismissing a lawsuit that alleged the company misled the public on its plans to achieve net zero.】

item.title: 必和必拓集团与惠顿贵金属公司签署白银流协议
item.description: 必和必拓集团周二与惠顿贵金属旗下子公司达成一项长期白银流协议，协议完成时将支付43亿美元预付款。【原文：BHP Group on Tuesday entered a long-term silver streaming agreement with a unit of Wheaton Precious Metals for an upfront payment of $4.3 billion at completion.】

item.title: 必和必拓集团上半年利润因大宗商品价格上涨跃升22%
item.description: 必和必拓集团周二公布的半年基本利润超出预期，这得益于上半年创纪录的铁矿石产量以及其核心商品铁矿石和铜价的上涨。【原文：BHP Group on Tuesday reported a better-than-expected half-year underlying profit, driven by record first-half iron ore production and higher prices for its key commodities, iron ore and copper.】
